Title: Authorizes municipalities and districts to enter into cooperative agreements for the provision of centralized public employee administrative and personnel services
Summary: Authorizes municipalities and districts to enter into cooperative agreements for the provision of centralized public employee administrative and personnel services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing cities, towns, villages, school districts, boards of cooperative educational services, library districts, fire districts, improvement districts and special districts to enter into cooperative agreements for the provision of centralized public employee administrative and personnel services
